text: the Istanbul nightclub shooting was a mass shooting in the early hours of 1 January 2017 in the European part of Istanbul, Turkey.Istanbul nightclub attack Uzbek ISIL member Abdulkadir Masharipov used an AK-47 assault rifle to shoot over 100 people in Reina nightclub, killing 39 of them. == References == Category:2017 mass shootings Category:2017 murders in Europe Category:2010s in Turkey Category:2010s mass shootings in Europe Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in 2017 Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in Europe Category:Attacks on nightclubs Category:Crime in Turkey Category:Islamic State Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in 2017 Nightclub shooting Category:January 2017 events Category:Mass murder in 2017 Category:Mass murder in Europe Category:Terrorist incidents in Europe in 2017
title: Istanbul nightclub shooting
